firstVisitBanner.title: Welcome - Portfolio under construction
firstVisitBanner.body: This website-portfolio is still under construction. Development takes place in the evenings after my main job or on weekends, so some sections may be incomplete or subject to change

hero.role: Currently seeking a early-mid front-end role to consolidate production experience

repo.textBeforeLink: To explore the GitHub repository for this site, follow this
repo.privacy: This site is intentionally not indexed for privacy.

intro.paragraph1: My name is Francesco, i'm an experienced Front-End Developer with over 5 years of experience working in IT environments across different roles, from web development to technical support.
intro.paragraph2: This website collects experiments, studies, and projects related to web development, serving as a space for continuous growth, documentation, and demonstration of practical technical skills.
intro.morePrefix: Additional information about my professional background and availability can be found in the

dev.titlePrefix: Stack and how I am applying it here; learn more in

nuxt.title: Nuxt
nuxt.description: Intuitive project structure and smooth navigation without page reloads: it makes development simpler, cleaner, and more natural even on complex projects.

tailwind.title: Tailwind
tailwind.description: Lean, fast, and consistent styling system: it uses readable classes and keeps the styling workflow uniform across the team.

i18n.title: i18n
i18n.description: Centralized language management: text organized in one place and easy language switching on main pages.

emailjs.title: Email form
emailjs.description: n8n, EmailJS, and more recently Netlify Forms are the three systems for building forms, each with its own pros and cons.

netlify.title: Netlify
netlify.description: Platform used for frontend deployment, continuous integration, and automatic publishing through GitHub-based workflows.

codex.title: Codex
codex.description: Development assistant used to support code scaffolding, refactoring, and project organization under direct developer oversight.

clickup.title: ClickUp
clickup.description: Task and project management tool used to organize activities, track progress, and collaborate effectively with team members.

figma.title: Figma
figma.description: Design and collaboration tool used to inspect layouts, extract component specifications, and create wireframes or basic page structures when needed.

carousel.subtitle: I LIKE MOSS AND GECKOS
carousel.title: Some Best Forests
carousel.shiftHint: Press "shift" and use the mouse wheel to scroll horizontally!

fallback.body: The content you are looking for does not exist, you probably clicked a sample link from the menu.
fallback.counter: This fallback has appeared {count} times on this browser.
fallback.btsCaption: "Me" working on this project during the weekends

summary.title: Brief summary
summary.p1: Always passionate about video games, I approached the computer as a hobby, until COVID, when I took a frontend programming course which evolved into a professional path in web development.
summary.p2: I have worked on building websites and frontend applications, gaining experience as a frontend developer and later contributing to project coordination for small independent startups.
summary.p3: In the last year, I worked in an IT support role within a corporate environment, where I provide technical assistance and system support, while continuing to strengthen my programming and development skills.
summary.p4: My objective is to join a company where I can further develop my technical expertise, contribute to meaningful digital products, and grow professionally within a balanced and structured work environment.

availability.title: Availability
availability.p1: I am open and flexible in evaluating new professional opportunities.
availability.summaryTitle: In summary, I am available for:
availability.p2: I perform best, especially in terms of productivity and quality, in remote or hybrid environments with a balanced mix of team collaboration and independent task execution.
availability.p3: I am also open to initial on-site periods when required for onboarding and evaluation.

items.licenses: Driving license: Category A and B
